cards.rules_text:
{T}: Create a paradox [i](Choose one, the unchosen effect happens at the beginning of your next upkeep.)[/i]
— Target creature phases out. 
— Tap target creature you control.
[i]Symmetry 3[/i] — When this creature enters, if you control three or more nonland permanents that share a mana value, the owner of target creature puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

Create a paradox.
— Deal 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
— If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
{T}: Choose 1, 2, or {3}, create a 1/1 green and blue Fractal creature token with the chosen mana value.

Distortion {B} [i](You may cast this spell for it's distortion cost, if you do, swap the positions of the words in brackets.)[/i]
You [gain] 3 life and each opponent [lose]s 3 life. Then, draw a card for each opponent who has more life then you.

Recast {4}{B} [i]({4}{B}, Exile this card from the battlefield any time you could cast it, if you do you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost. )[/i]
Flash
When this creature enters, target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

Activated abilities of permanents you control cost {1} less to activate.
Whenever you abstract, target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. [i](You abtract whenever you create a paradox, or cast a spell from exile.)[/i]

Recast {3}{R} [i]({3}{R}, Exile this card from the battlefield any time you could cast it, if you do you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost. )[/i]
This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter for each time you've cast a spell named Unending Fractal this game.

Recast {5}{WB} [i]({5}{WB}, Exile this card from the battlefield any time you could cast it, if you do you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost. )[/i]
When this enchantment enters, destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. If it was cast from exile, instead destroy target nonland permanent, then exile this enchantment.

Recast {3}{U} [i]({3}{U}, Exile this card from the battlefield any time you could cast it, if you do you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost. )[/i]
You may have this creature enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it has recast {3}{U}.
As long as this creature is prototyped, it has recast {5}, otherwise, it has flying.

Distortion {1}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for it's distortion cost, if you do, swap the positions of the words in brackets.)[/i]
[Target] creature you control gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Goad [each] creature you don't control.
Create X 1/1 blue and green Fractal creature tokens with mana value X.

Distortion {1}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for it's distortion cost, if you do, swap the positions of the words in brackets.)[/i]
When this creature enters, put [three] +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
When this creature dies, return [a] land card/s from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

Distortion {U}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for it's distortion cost, if you do, swap the positions of the words in brackets.)[/i]
Counter target spell with mana value [one] or less. Create a 1/1 green and blue Fractal creature token with mana value [three].

Distortion {2}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for it's distortion cost, if you do, swap the positions of the words in brackets.)[/i]
[White] spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[Nonwhite] spells you cast cost {1} more to cast.

Menace
Whenever you abstract for the first time each turn create a Junk token. [i](You abtract whenever you create a paradox, or cast a spell from exile.)[/i]
Whenever you abstract, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent. [i](You abtract whenever you create a paradox, or cast a spell from exile.)[/i]
Whenever you abstract, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. [i](You abtract whenever you create a paradox, or cast a spell from exile.)[/i]

Menace
This creature's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.
{1}, Sacrifice a nontoken, nonland permanent: Create a Junk token.

Create a paradox [i](Choose one, the unchosen effect happens at the beginning of your next upkeep.)[/i]
— Exile target artifact or target players graveyard.
— Exile target enchantment or target players graveyard.

[i]Symmetry 4[/i] — As long as you control four or more nonland permanents that share a mana value, other creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever this creature attacks, you gain X life where X is the greatest number of nonland permanents you control that share a mana value.

Recast {4}{UR} [i]({4}{UR}, Exile this card from the battlefield any time you could cast it, if you do you may cast it from exile without paying its mana cost. )[/i]
When this creature enters, exile up to one instant, sorcery or artifact card from a graveyard, you may cast it this turn. When you do, exile it as it resolves.

Whenever you sacrifice a token, you may pay {2}, if you do, create a paradox [i](Choose one, the unchosen effect happens at the beginning of your next upkeep.)[/i]
— Create a tapped Junk token.
— Put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Deathtouch, lifelink
When this creature enters, create a number of Junk tokens equal to its power.
When this creature enters, create a 1/1 green and blue Fractal creature token with equal mana value.

Vigilance
Artifacts you control have “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn, activate only as a sorcery.”

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Create a Junk token.
[-3]: This planeswalker deals X damage to target creature, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, this emblem deals 4 damage to any target.”

cards.rules_text:
Junk you control are treasures in addition to their other types and have “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”
When this enchantment enters, create two tapped Junk tokens [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Creatures you control with mana value zero have “This creature gets +1/+1 for each counter on it”.
Creatures you control with mana value one, two, or three have flying.
Creatures you control with mana value four or greater have vigilance.
Each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is its mana value.

Destroy target creature or planeswalker, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

When this artifact leaves the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and the other on the bottom of your library.

Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card, and exile it, you may play it until the end of your next turn. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Exile the top three cards of your library, you may play them this turn. At the beginning of your next end step, if any of those cards remain in exile, draw that many cards.
You may play an additional land this turn.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
[i]Symmetry 3[/i] — When this creature enters, return another target creature to its owners hand, if you control three or more nonland permanents that share a mana value, create a token that's a copy of it.

Untapped creatures can't block.
Tapped creatures can block.
Noninstant spells without flash can be played anytime a player could cast an instant. 
Instants and spells with flash can only be cast any time a player could cast a sorcery.

When this creature dies, exile it. You may cast it from exile until the end of your next turn.
